definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

pinyin: duo1 xiang4 shi4 fang1 cheng2 zu3

sentences.english: Its optimal solution is obtained by finding a nonnegative solution of compatible equations.
sentences.chinese: 其最优解是通过求一个相容方程组的非负解而得到。

sentences.english: Chapter 5 focuses on the asymptotic analysis to a parabolic model with inner absorptions and weighted localized sources.
sentences.chinese: 第五章考虑带有权函数和内吸收的抛物型方程组。

sentences.english: The case of regular solutions of nonlinear PDAEs is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并研究了非线性偏微分方程组的解在正则部分的情形。

sentences.english: This paper has investigated the system of congruences and given them the asymptotic formula of the number of solutions.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一类同余方程组解数的公式或渐近公式。

sentences.english: A study is made on Cauchy problem of compressible Eulers equations with relaxation term.
sentences.chinese: 研究具松弛项可压缩的欧拉方程组柯西问题。

sentences.english: Some properties of the sub-subspaces and their applications on the systems of linear equations are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了次子空间的性质及其在线性方程组上的应用。

sentences.english: The correctness of the complete Euler equation set is verified with two functional examples.
sentences.chinese: 通过两个算例验证了完全欧拉方程组的正确性。

sentences.english: The presence of intergranular stress in the propellant bed is a key factor that determines the classification of the balance equation.
sentences.chinese: 颗粒间应力的存在是决定方程组类型的重要条件。

sentences.english: In the practical work we have to obtain the solution of the binary third-degree equation again and again for many times.
sentences.chinese: 在实际工作中为此要多次反复求解二元三次方程组。

sentences.english: A set of basic fluid mechanical equations is developed by the theory of functions of complex variables.
sentences.chinese: 利用复变函数的方法推导出相应的基本方程组。

sentences.english: Those are the equations we have to solve.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们要解的方程组。

sentences.english: Otherwise, well, AX equals B has either no solution, or infinitely many solutions. Yes?
sentences.chinese: 否则，此线性方程组无解，或者无穷解？

sentences.english: The construction of solution space was given and the solution approach was offered.
sentences.chinese: 并给出方程组的形式解解空间构造和求解方法。

sentences.english: And, in fact,something that is known as Maxwell's equations.
Induced a kind of convenient procedure for the solution of the linearity equational group.
sentences.chinese: 归纳出解线性方程组的简捷程序。

sentences.english: In this paper, the non—linear differential equations of aircraft motion are simplified by the condition of steady spin.
sentences.chinese: 按稳定尾旋的条件对飞机运动方程组作了简化。

definition: elimination (math)/to eliminate one variable from equations
discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
